title: Offering coaching and adding people to play aswell ^_^
body:
Hey there ^_^,

I am looking to offer free coaching/tips to anyone wanting to climb in the game that are having a hard time finding success. I am only D4 at the moment and I main top but have played every role in the game and can offer helpful advice to anyone below diamond (Sorry anyone higher but I can't help you there) 

Also willing to add people just to have fun and play Tft/norms/flex and even aram or urf when the mode is out just add me in game

IGN: RequiescatinPace

Thanks ^_^
